author: cnauroth
msg: HDFS-6028. Merging change r1572753 from trunk to branch-2.

author: scottbw
msg: Removed dependency on DWR for core widgets; this is only needed for widgets using the Wave, oAuth and Wookie-Ext features.

author: scottbw
msg: Replaced calls to DWR from the wookie.js feature script, instead using AJAX to directly call Wookie services

author: scottbw
msg: Replaced the DWR-based WidgetAPI with two REST servlets connected to the WidgetAuthorizationFilter in web.xml. This means we don't require DWR for simple widgets.

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-5468: reduce RAM usage of hunspell
